column5: You may not want to drive hundreds of miles out of your way to see The Thing?, but if you ever find yourself traveling along I-10 in southeastern Arizona, you would be remiss not to stop and take a look. This is roadside America at its kitschy best. It would spoil the fun to know ahead of time what The Thing is, but suffice to say the museum features some antique Americana at its best.\nDon’t worry about finding “The Thing?” There are scores of billboards pointing the way. You really CAN’T miss it. There is a very small admission charge and plenty of free parking.
column8: 2631 N Johnson Rd; Dragoon, Arizona, 85609; United States
column14: ['The Disney Collection', 'Best Video Film & Cultural Center', 'Rocky Mountain Quilt Museum', 'Curioporium']
